title: Why doesn’t the man fall out of the helicopter? Is he able to shoot accurately on the move? If yes, why? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, he is strapped in. As far as accuracy, it's harder than shooting at a targets while stationary but you'd be surprised how quickly you can adapt to it and start connecting especially over terrain that makes it possible to see your bullet impacts, the human mind is surprisingly good at making the adjustments automatically. Try for yourself sometime, several companies offer helicopter hog hunting for around 2000 USD.
